---
title: Routing concepts
engine: julia
execute:
  cache: false
---

Standard names for flow state variables in the Tables below that contain `instantaneous` in
the `quantity` part of the standard name can be valid for an internal time step (depending
on the model time simulation time step) and thus considered instantaneous compared to the
model simulation time step Δt $\SIb{}{s}$. These flow state variables can also be specified
as a model output variable.

## Reservoirs

#### Generic input {#input-generic-reservoir}
```{julia}
# | code-fold: true
include("../docs_utils.jl")
generate_table(Wflow.Routing, :reservoir_generic_input; relative_widths = [6, 5, 2, 2])
```

#### Input
```{julia}
# | code-fold: true
generate_table(Wflow.Routing, :reservoir_input; relative_widths = [6, 5, 2, 2])
```

#### Static or cyclic/forcing input
```{julia}
# | code-fold: true
generate_table([Wflow.Routing, Wflow.LandHydrologySBM], :reservoir_static_cyclic_forcing_input; relative_widths = [6, 5, 2, 2])
```

#### States
```{julia}
# | code-fold: true
generate_table(Wflow.Routing, :reservoir_state; relative_widths = [3, 3, 1])
```

#### Output
```{julia}
# | code-fold: true
generate_table(Wflow.Routing, :reservoir_output; relative_widths = [3, 3, 1])
```

## Sediment
### Transport capacity Overland flow
#### Input
| Standard Name | Description | Unit | Default |
| ------ | ---- | -- | -- |
| `sediment__particle_density` | Particle density | kg m⁻³ | 2650.0 |
| `land_surface_sediment__median_diameter` | Particle median diameter | mm | 0.1 |
| `clay__mean_diameter` | Clay mean diameter | μm | 2.0 |
| `silt__mean_diameter` | Silt mean diameter | μm | 10.0 |
| `sand__mean_diameter` | Sand mean diameter | μm | 200.0 |
| `sediment_small_aggregates__mean_diameter` | Small aggregates mean diameter | μm | 30.0 |
| `sediment_large_aggregates__mean_diameter` | Large aggregates mean diameter | μm | 500.0 |
| `land_surface_water_sediment__govers_transport_capacity_coefficient` | Govers transport capacity coefficient | - | 0.000505 |
| `land_surface_water_sediment__govers_transport_capacity_exponent` | Govers transport capacity exponent | - | 4.27 |
: {.striped .hover}

### Transport capacity River
#### Input
| Standard Name | Description | Unit | Default |
| ------ | ---- | -- | -- |
| `river_sediment__median_diameter` | Particle median diameter | mm | 0.1 |
| `river_water_sediment__bagnold_transport_capacity_coefficient` | Bagnold transport capacity coefficient | - | - |
| `river_water_sediment__bagnold_transport_capacity_exponent` | Bagnold transport capacity exponent | - | - |
| `river_water_sediment__kodatie_transport_capacity_a_coefficient` | Kodatie transport capacity coefficient a | - | - |
| `river_water_sediment__kodatie_transport_capacity_b_coefficient` | Kodatie transport capacity coefficient b | - | - |
| `river_water_sediment__kodatie_transport_capacity_c_coefficient` | Kodatie transport capacity coefficient c | - | - |
| `river_water_sediment__kodatie_transport_capacity_d_coefficient` | Kodatie transport capacity coefficient d | - | - |
: {.striped .hover}

### Overland flow transport
#### Output
| Standard Name | Description | Unit |
| --- | --- | - |
| `land_surface_water_sediment_transport_capacity__mass_flow_rate` | Total sediment transport capacity | ton Δt⁻¹ |
| `land_surface_water_clay_transport_capacity__mass_flow_rate` | Clay transport capacity | ton Δt⁻¹ |
| `land_surface_water_sediment__to_river_mass_flow_rate` | Total sediment flux flowing into the river | ton Δt⁻¹ |
| `land_surface_water_clay__to_river_mass_flow_rate` | Clay flux flowing into the river | ton Δt⁻¹ |
| `land_surface_water_silt__to_river_mass_flow_rate` | Silt flux flowing into the river | ton Δt⁻¹ |
| `land_surface_water_sand__to_river_mass_flow_rate` | Sand flux flowing into the river | ton Δt⁻¹ |
| `land_surface_water_small_aggregates__to_river_mass_flow_rate` | Small aggregates flux flowing into the river | ton Δt⁻¹ |
| `land_surface_water_large_aggregates__to_river_mass_flow_rate` | Large aggregates flux flowing into the river | ton Δt⁻¹ |
| `land_surface_water_sediment__mass_flow_rate` | Total sediment flux | ton Δt⁻¹ |
: {.striped .hover}

### River erosion
#### Input
| Standard Name | Description | Unit | Default |
| ------ | ---- | -- | -- |

: {.striped .hover}

### River transport
#### Input
| Standard Name | Description | Unit | Default |
| ------ | ---- | -- | -- |
| `reservoir_surface__area` | Reservoir surface area | m² | - |
| `reservoir_water_sediment__bedload_trapping_efficiency` | Reservoir sediment bedload trapping efficiency | - | 1.0 |
| `river_bottom_and_bank_clay__mass_fraction` | River bed/bank content clay | - | 0.15 |
| `river_bottom_and_bank_silt__mass_fraction` | River bed/bank content silt | - | 0.65 |
| `river_bottom_and_bank_sand__mass_fraction` | River bed/bank content sand | - | 0.15 |
| `river_bottom_and_bank_gravel__mass_fraction` | River bed/bank content gravel | - | 0.05 |
| `clay__mean_diameter` | Clay mean diameter | µm | 2.0 |
| `silt__mean_diameter` | Silt mean diameter | µm | 10.0 |
| `sand__mean_diameter` | Sand mean diameter | µm | 200.0 |
| `sediment_small_aggregates__mean_diameter` | Small aggregates mean diameter | µm | 30.0 |
| `sediment_large_aggregates__mean_diameter` | Large aggregates mean diameter | µm | 500.0 |
| `gravel__mean_diameter` | Gravel mean diameter | µm | 2000.0 |
: {.striped .hover}

#### States
| Standard Name | Description | Unit |
| --- | --- | - |
| `river_bed_clay__mass` | Clay stored on the river bed after deposition | ton |
| `river_bed_silt__mass` | Silt stored on the river bed after deposition | ton |
| `river_bed_sand__mass` | Sand stored on the river bed after deposition | ton |
| `river_bed_small_aggregates__mass` | Small aggregates stored on the river bed after deposition | ton |
| `river_bed_large_aggregates__mass` | Large aggregates stored on the river bed after deposition | ton |
| `river_bed_gravel__mass` | Gravel stored on the river bed after deposition | ton |
| `river_water_clay__mass` | Clay left in cell | ton |
| `river_water_silt__mass` | Silt left in cell | ton |
| `river_water_sand__mass` | Sand left in cell | ton |
| `river_water_small_aggregates__mass` | Small aggregates left in cell | ton |
| `river_water_large_aggregates__mass` | Large aggregates left in cell | ton |
| `river_water_gravel__mass` | Gravel left in cell | ton? |
| `river_water_clay__mass_flow_rate` | Sediment flux (clay) | ton Δt⁻¹ |
| `river_water_silt__mass_flow_rate` | Sediment flux (silt) | ton Δt⁻¹ |
| `river_water_sand__mass_flow_rate` | Sediment flux (sand) | ton Δt⁻¹ |
| `river_water_small_aggregates__mass_flow_rate` | Sediment flux (small aggregates) | ton Δt⁻¹ |
| `river_water_large_aggregates__mass_flow_rate` | Sediment flux (large aggregates) | ton Δt⁻¹ |
| `river_water_gravel__mass_flow_rate` | Sediment flux (gravel) | ton Δt⁻¹ |
: {.striped .hover}

| Standard Name | Description | Unit |
| --- | --- | - |
| `river_bed_clay__mass` | Clay stored on the river bed after deposition | ton |

| `river_bed_gravel__mass` | Gravel stored on the river bed after deposition | ton |
| `river_water_clay__mass` | Clay left in cell | ton |
| `river_water_silt__mass` | Silt left in cell | ton |
| `river_water_sand__mass` | Sand left in cell | ton |
| `river_water_small_aggregates__mass` | Small aggregates left in cell | ton |

| `river_water_clay__mass_flow_rate` | Sediment flux (clay) | ton Δt⁻¹ |
| `river_water_silt__mass_flow_rate` | Sediment flux (silt) | ton Δt⁻¹ |
| `river_water_sand__mass_flow_rate` | Sediment flux (sand) | ton Δt⁻¹ |

| `river_water_sediment__bedload_mass_concentration` | Bed load sediment concentration in the river | g m⁻³ |
